original_text: The rings must be near to the extra piece of wood. They will hold the poles that you will use to carry the table.
korean_text: 턱 곁에 붙이라 이는 상을 멜 채를 꿸 곳이며

sentences.original_text: The rings must be near to the extra piece of wood.
sentences.korean_translation: 고리들은 나무 조각 근처에 있어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: that you will use to carry the table.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 테이블을 운반하는 데 사용할 것입니다.
